translation:
Piratini, October 26, 1838.

Most Illustrious Sir

Antonio José Bonilha arrives at this point with the intention of loading some carts with the flour seized from the sloop “Mineira”; therefore, may Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship Secretariat of Finance in Piratini, October 26, 1838. Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, General Commander of Police of Boqueirão. Domingos José de Almeida

Official letter of the Most Excellent dated October 26, received on November 1.

Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães General Commander of Police of Boqueirão From the Ministry of Finance
